com.mygame.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygame.entities.Sprite
      • com.mygame.entities.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Attackable, java.lang.Comparable<Sprite>

    public class Player
extends Sprite
implements Attackable
    Contains box2d physics object, all animations and information related to player
